attributes.action: To give a courtesy year to people who have passed there theory test during covid
attributes.additional_details: Because the theory test is governed by the government and parliament
attributes.background: I would like the parliament to give a courtesy year for people whom have passed there theory test in 2020 to 2022 as they have not been able to have driving lessons during that time

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Extend theory test certificates or offer free retake: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596206

Extended Theory Test expiry dates by 6 months: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602298

Extend validity of the driving theory certificate from 2 to 4 years: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591842
